Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Arthur Vogel Papers TAM.195
6.5 Linear Feet (11 boxes)
circa 1940s-ca. 1980s Arthur Vogel was a leftist playwright, and at one time probably a member of the Communist Party USA. The collection principally consists of typescripts of Vogel's unpublished plays. The collection also includes correspondence, other writings, and clippings. Materials are in English
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Materials found in repository; provenance is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 1997.066.
Historical/Biographical Note
Arthur Vogel was a leftist playwright, and at one time probably a member of the Communist Party USA.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Arthur Vogel Papers; TAM 195; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Scope and Contents
The collection principally consists of typescripts of Vogel's unpublished plays. The collection also includes correspondence, other writings, and clippings.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by Arthur Vogel was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
